Week 9

April 22, 2022

Amber Art & Design visit

1:10

We’ll depart at 1:15pm by car to Davey Lopes Recreation Center to witness Amber Art & Design’s parachute cloth painting workshop. See more info on this.

Earth Day at Peace & Plenty Park

3:30

We’ll visit Greg Victor, head of the friends group at Peace & Plenty Park, on the southside of Providence. Through a City Council ordinance, streets have changed to become more pedestrian friendly. Greg Victor will take us on a walk to see these changes.

DWRI Letterpress

5:00

If we have time, we’ll stop into DWRI Letterpress and see their political printing work. Wear your mask!

Public Projects

I’ll check in with you about your public projects, and if time, we’ll sit outside or back in the classroom to discuss progress. Next week we will have half the class dedicated to looking at these. Keep progressing on a project for public space or an open inquiry project.
